item.title: Sarasota Co. School District hosts first town hall of the school year receiving backlash from parents about transportation issues
item.description: Parents and students said there isn’t enough room on buses and there are too many delays picking up and dropping off students.

item.title: Bradenton woman thinks she’s being scammed, instead recovers over $100K with help of local detective
item.description: Bradenton woman thinks she’s being scammed, instead recovers over $100K with help of local detective

item.title: Eleven illegal gambling houses are raided in Polk County
item.description: Eleven illegal gambling houses are raided in Polk County

item.description: Polk County undercover operation busts illegal gambling

item.title: Bradenton man charged with violent second-degree murder of girlfriend in April
item.description: The victim died from traumatic brain injury, facial fractures, and other internal injuries.

item.title: INTERVIEW: Mayor Short speaks on Bean Point swimming closure after latest fatality
item.description: In the month of August there have been six incidents involving swimmers.

item.title: PHOTO: DeSoto woman accused of animal cruelty for seeking DIY amputation instructions for cat
item.description: The cat's leg was “reduced to exposed bone,” according to the sheriff’s office.

item.title: Man accused of exposing himself to family at Lido Beach
item.description: The following day, police say they spotted the man at the same beach, where he was arrested.

item.title: Undercover operation nets 28 arrests in illegal gambling case in Polk County
item.description: Also, 48 gambling machines were confiscated and $100,971 in cash was seized.

item.title: Attorney General Pamela Bondi held press conference in Tampa on human smuggling crackdown
item.description: The event will start around 3 p.m. at the U.S. Attorney’s Office for the Middle District of Florida in Tampa.

item.title: Hogtied dog abandoned in Ruskin manages to hop to safety; owner sought
item.description: Someone tied the dog’s front legs together and back legs together before abandoning it.

item.title: Jury now deliberating in Donna Adelson murder trial after defense closes with fiery plea for acquittal
item.description: A group of 12 is now huddled in a jury room, embarking on an effort to determine if Donna Adelson will spend the rest of her life in a Florida prison.

item.title: Get ready for some rainy weather
item.description: Rain chances will go up in the days to come

item.title: Man arrested after leaving bag full of cocaine at hotel counter, deputies charge
item.description: Hotel employees called deputies after they saw the contents of the bag.
